The world would become more connected and interconnected, as people could travel instantly from one place to another, leading to faster communication and exchange of ideas.
It would also lead to a significant reduction in carbon emissions and travel time, making the world more environmentally friendly.
The transportation industry would be disrupted, as teleportation would replace traditional modes of transportation such as planes, trains, and cars.
It would also open up new opportunities for business and tourism, as people could visit different countries and cities instantly.
However, it could also lead to overcrowding and strain on infrastructure, as well as raise concerns about security and safety.
